messages.subject: Re: I'm new! ^_^
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome!! You have it absolutely right... art goes in the Photos section and fiction in the Archive of Stories folder in the Files section.  Be sure to check
messages.messageBody:
Welcome!!

You have it absolutely right... art goes in the Photos section and
fiction in the Archive of Stories folder in the Files section. Be
sure to check out the guidelines for posting and uploading, fiction
particularly.

I'm sure everyone here will enjoy new art & fic!

phil

--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "Kikane" <woaisoujirou@y...>
wrote:

>

> have one fanfiction ^.^;; does that go in the files section?
> --Arigatou gozaimsu!!
> --Kikane

Hajimemashite, my name is Kikane! Yoroshiku onegaishima-su! If I
have fanart, where should I put it? In the photos section? I only
have one fanfiction ^.^;; does that go in the files section?
